Running BeamScheme under LinuxÂ¶

Open a terminal window. Change to the directory where you installed BeamScheme. At the prompt enter:

./beamscheme &<enter>

Alternatively you can create a link to the application and place it on your desktop. Refer to your system documentation for details.
